text:
We are really enhancing
the human creativity

and pushing that boundary
where we are delivering value
for everyone.

And so as we move
forward with these models
and AI, they become more powerful
and they create additional personalization

and really dive into
enhancing our human skills.

AWS is really supporting DoiT in
GenAI by a whole different set

of tools available to us,
expertise across the organization.

A big challenge that our customers
are facing is this landscape
of security and compliance.

Customers are really having to
navigate this emerging world

where organizations have to
be very mindful of the data
that they are handling.

We are using generative AI to,
to solve customer problems

by taking user case approach
with them really
going deep into their use case

into their culture to
be able to leverage that
and use services like Amazon Bedrock

and Amazon Bedrock agents
to be able to connect
to their existing data.
